extension.summary: Sonarr: a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users
extension.description: Sonarr (2.0.0.4689) is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on

extension.description: Jackett (0.7.1256) works as a proxy server: it translates queries from applications (CouchPotato, Mylar, SickRage, Sonarr, etc.) into tracker-site-specific HTTP queries, parses the HTML response, then sends results back to the requesting software. This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches. Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping and translation logic, removing the burden from other applications.
extension.disclaimer: Keep it legal and carry on
